dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3052 IH: To amend title 40, United States Code, to add certain counties to the definition of “Appalachian region”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Fleischmann introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to add certain counties to the definition of Appalachian region.

section.text: Section 14102(a)(1)(K) of title 40, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting Hickman, Humphreys, after Hawkins,; and
